sequence:
Long Island's Inner Peace

<size=45>II 「No More Exercise!」</size>

scripts.say: *Gulp gulp, munch munch*... ha! Coke and fries are such a natural pairing~
Commander, do you want to try some chips?
Hmm? Do I look that different?
Sigh, I left my "social armor" in my dorm... it’s rare to go on vacation, so we should all unwind and relax!
You want me to maintain my fitness? Umm...
You want me to start right now? Hey ~ let me go ~ I want to go back ---
